summary: The 'Stop Antisemitism on College Campuses Act' (S. 1182) aims to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965. The bill prohibits institutions of higher education from participating in federal student loan and grant programs if they authorize, facilitate, fund, or support events that promote antisemitism on campus. Antisemitism is defined by the International Holocaust Remembrance Alliance's working definition from May 2016, including its contemporary examples.
